channel.title: NPC hits zero when they shouldn't?
channel.description:
I was just testing some NPC's that I added to make sure that X and Y cords are right, and drops, etc. But I ran into this odd (*might be*) glitch. All NPC's hit zero's . (so far I only have found that Tztok-Jad hits anything). I have 99 in every skill, with no armor and a whip, and I fought the Chaos ele, Daggonth kings, etc without being hit a single time. I created a lvl3 noob and fought a lvl 21 guard and he kept on hitting zero.
Did I forget to add something? O_O I really would like to find out if this the result of something missing, or just plain weird luck...
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 18, 2009, 04:39:55 pm[/size][hr]It appears to be just weird luck.
